                                                                               
 Usage: langchain app new [OPTIONS] [NAME]                                     
                                                                               
 Create a new LangServe application.                                           
                                                                               
+- Arguments -----------------------------------------------------------------+
|   name      [NAME]  The name of the folder to create                        |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
+- Options -------------------------------------------------------------------+
| --package                             TEXT  Packages to seed the project    |
|                                             with                            |
| --pip                --no-pip               Pip install the template(s) as  |
|                                             editable dependencies           |
| --non-interactive    --interactive          Don't prompt for any input      |
|                                             [default: interactive]          |
| --help                                      Show this message and exit.     |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
